summary.Title: Experienced Hardware Lead Engineer
summary.Presentation:
Do you want to be involved in developing state-of-the-art technologies for future products? Would you like to have many technical interfaces and enhance your engineering skills and knowledge?
<

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be involved in developing state-of-the-art technologies for future products? Would you like to have many technical interfaces and enhance your engineering skills and knowledge?

 

Then you might be the new colleague EPOS are looking for!

 

Join the team
You will become part of EPOS’ hardware development team where you will refer directly to the Head of Hardware Development. The hardware development team develops wired and wireless (Bluetooth and DECT) hardware and electronics with best-in-class performance for EPOS’ premium audio products.

 

EPOS work in cross-functional project teams with Software, DSP, acoustics, mechanical and manufacturing engineers. They offer you the opportunity to be part of a dynamic company with a technically deep-seated R&D organization, an informal work culture and a manager who will help you excel in your role.

 

Lead the technical aspects of delivering HW solutions into EPOS’ projects
This position is about technical leadership and mentorship, and you will take the lead on the technical aspects of delivering HW concept/solutions into EPOS’ projects.

 

With a team of 3 HW Lead engineers you will drive the collaboration with colleagues in Device Development and ensure that EPOS HW solutions are compatible and fit into the future products covering headsets, video solutions and speakerphones. You will also drive your own projects and be a key driver in completive testing and build learnings on products performance in the market.

Working with EPOS’ front-end technology projects

As the Experienced Lead Hardware Engineer, you will take the lead from the hardware perspective and be responsible for hardware specifications in EPOS’ early development phase. Working with their front-end technology projects, you will track and investigate several technologies, so they understand and integrate the right technologies in their products and deliver the best user-experience.

 

You will ensure “proof of concept” for critical concepts and provide demonstrators where user experience or validation method is crucial before executing the project. You will ensure defined hardware quality targets are kept throughout the project by close follow up and definitions of test protocols and test plans for the project that will be executed in corporation with EPOS’ external partners.

 

Who EPOS are looking for
You bring a solid technical foundation in electronics design, and you can define the hardware architectures and requirements for future products.

 

You will participate in the product development processes from the early workshops to final concepts. EPOS expect that you are skilled in planning and coordinating hardware development activities in an international project setup with several stakeholders, internally and externally.

The ideal candidate holds the following technical skills and experiences:
• 5+ years of experience in audio/wireless consumer device hardware development
• Wireless & wired systems knowledge (DECT, Bluetooth, USB)
• Hardware design and verification methodology, including software integration
• Hardware architectures design and systems requirements
• Desirable knowledge in one or more fields – Batteries, RF, USB, BT
• Product Development from concept to scale with global partners
• Hardware/software integration and testing

Important personal skills to success in the role are:
• Structured way of working with can-do attitude
• Team player and problem-solving
• Thrives with a broad contact base to different competence areas
• Effective communication skills in written and oral English - our company language
• Able to set direction and involve people
• Innovative, analytical, and holistic minded with great coordination skills

EPOS offer
You will be working in a growing international company with rich opportunity for professional and personal development. EPOS’ expert team is looking forward to welcoming you into their positive and encouraging work environment. They all strive for an open and supportive way of working where sharing knowledge and ideas are highly valued.


About EPOS

EPOS is a global leader in audio solutions for gamers and the corporate world. Based on pioneering audio technology, they strive to unleash human potential by perfecting audio experiences and delivering innovative design and performance with all of EPOS’ audio solutions. At the core of the company is the ambition to take excellent sound experience for enterprises and gamers to the next level – with the clear purpose to help individuals as well as teams across the globe to achieve their full potential through the power of audio.

The name EPOS is derived from Latin and ancient Greek and is used to describe epic stories, speech and poetry. The name encapsulates the dedication to create solutions that enable ways of communication through The Power of Audio.

EPOS is part of the Demant Group – a world-leading audio and hearing technology group that offers solutions and services to help people connect and communicate with the world around them. With headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark, EPOS operates in a global market with offices and partners in more than 30 countries while it simultaneously builds on more than 115 years of experience of working with innovation and sound.

Interested?

The recruitment process is handled by mpeople on behalf of EPOS. If you have any questions about the position or EPOS, please get in touch with Birgitte Vilsgaard on bgv@mpeople.dk or +45 28 18 18 91

We look forward to hearing from you.
